name: Litemint.io
description:
Hi Everyone, here is my latest game.

Litemint.io (beta) is a fast pace, instant card battles game. With this game, my goal is to create an experience similar to IO games (fast on-boarding and fast sessions) while incorporating the mechanics of collectible card games along with having these cards issued as collectible on the blockchain (optional for players).

CORE FEATURES

  • Fast pace, multiplayer IO style game.
  • Unique easy-to-learn gameplay with no learning curve.
  • Endless, instant match ups.
  • Persistent seasonal rankings with daily rewards.
  • All collectibles tradable on the Stellar DEX.
  • Universal syncs on any platform with Facebook or Litemint ( Stellar Wallet).
  • Cyberpunk theme and original lore.

Enjoy! Feedback welcome.
